attributes.additional_details: Scottish Power are planning a large-scale windfarm on the edge of Snowdonia and in the beautiful Dee Valley. The 25 proposed turbines would be the tallest erected in Britain at 145 metres and not even in an area designated by the Welsh Assembly for windfarm development. This 'wind factory' which would blight this unique landscape. The UK government needs to put a stop to this immediately. For more information see http://stemm.org.uk/
